column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I always love going to the Art Institute because...well...it's awesome.  Yesterday
column3: I went through rooms I haven't before because I'm always called into the European rooms upstairs.  Instead
column4: we stayed on the first level and went through the American Artists exhibits and they were really excellent.  Both "Nighthawks" and "American Gothic" are there right now and I've never seen either one "live" so that was cool.
